Html:
Hi all,

How to process long running tasks in ViewModel of a module in prism in a thread different from UI. If I use UI thread, the UI are hanged and really annoying users.

I have been searching for this and find this post here: http://weblogs.asp.net/jimjackson/archive/2010/05/21/using-the-backgroundworker-in-a-silverlight-mvvm-application.aspx to suggest to use background thread. However, I don't know how to initialize and use background thread in prism framework.

 

Please help to share.

Thanks

Truyenle

Hi Truyenle,

As far as I know, there is no official guidance regarding the use of background workers in Prism as out of the box. However, after checking the article you mentioned, I believe you should be able to apply the concepts described in a Prism application without problems.

Based on my understanding, the only apparent different when using Prism would be that the view and view model would be resolved through the container. As this doesn't seem to interfere with the logic described in the aforementioned blog post you could use the same view and view model.

In the following link you can find a modified version of the Hello World Quickstart, which includes the code snippets provided in the aforementioned blog post, under the name Prism with BackgroundWorker.zip:

  • Prism with BackgroundWorker.zip

I hope you find this useful,

Damian Cherubini
http://blogs.southworks.net/dcherubini

Thank youuuuuu! You save me a day.
